com.regawmod.hardestgame.entity

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.regawmod.entity.Entity
      • com.regawmod.entity.MovableEntity
        • com.regawmod.hardestgame.entity.Player
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Renderable, Updatable

    public final class Player
extends MovableEntity
    A player that moves around in the level and collects coins while avoiding enemies.
    Author:
    Dan Wager
